Condor:

Condor decided to go down, soon he found inside a chamber. He 
followed a corritor and carefully he took his energon's knife.  

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Condor:
> 
> Condor crept to ladder and looked carefully if he could use it to 
go 
> up or down.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> > It kept leading down away, until it came to a wall, underneath 
was 
> another
> > vent, and a small ladder to the right.
